feature.label: edu.toronto.cs.ome.eclipse.feature.tests
feature.description: OpenOME unit test plugins. Used in conjunction with OpenOME Project SDK.
feature.license: OpenOME is provided by University of Toronto: http://www.cs.toronto.edu/km/openome. It is a open-source software under the license Eclipse Public License (EPL) 1.0.
